speaker: smithy
dialog: Hello my young apprentice, I have a special task for you to do today. You’ll need to head into the caves and collect me some OBSIDIAN!

speaker: smithy
dialog: You’ll find OBSIDIAN shards in sacred pots scattered inside the cave. Jump and smash down on top of them with your HAMMER to break them open.

speaker: smithy
dialog: You should tread carefully though, as some of the pots are CURSED! You’ll need to learn how to protect yourself using the present I gave you...

speaker: smithy
dialog: The Legendary Ancient Blade of the Hero! Or LABOTH for short. I found it in the cave many years ago, and have studied its secrets ever since.

speaker: smithy
dialog: The LABOTH will protect against any attack, but a piece will break off each time you get hurt, as well as any time you hit the sword against anything EXCEPT it’s own OBSIDIAN ore.

speaker: smithy
dialog: If the LABOTH breaks all of its pieces, you will be defenseless! Although, I bet smashing an enemy with your HAMMER can at least stun them...

speaker: smithy
dialog: Don’t worry my friend, you can repair the LABOTH with your HAMMER! You can add as many pieces as you wish, but each piece will use up one of the OBSIDIAN shards you’ve collected.

speaker: smithy
dialog: The LABOTH will light your path through the deep caverns, the larger the sword, the more you can see around you.

speaker: smithy
dialog: Now get going! Travel as deep as you can go, and who knows, collecting shards might lead you to what’s possessing all these pots.

speaker: smithy
dialog: If you do come across whatever it may be, please take care of it... Just don’t forget to save some shards for me!

speaker: smithy
dialog: By now your blade is likely damaged, leaving you vulnerable.

speaker: smithy
dialog: Fear not! Damaged equipment is no problem for a blacksmith, even a novice such as yourself!

speaker: smithy
dialog: Here, take this hammer. You can use it to repair the LABOTH with obsidian shards, such as those commonly found among the old pots that litter dungeons.
<press [R] to repair your sword using collected shards>

speaker: smithy
dialog: The hammer has additional uses beyond repairs.

speaker: smithy
dialog: You can use it to smash open pots to reveal the obsidian shards within...

speaker: smithy
dialog: ...or to smash the shells of enemies who might be mimicing those same pots!

speaker: smithy
dialog: The hammer can also temporarily stun enemies, but it takes a weapon such as the LABOTH to kill them for good.

speaker: smithy
dialog: I've stocked the tunnels ahead with some pots so you can practice using your hammer.

speaker: smithy
dialog: You can also use the obsidian you collect to repair the LABOTH, but remember:

speaker: smithy
dialog: a longer sword can take more damage and strike further out, but it may prove unwieldy in smaller spaces.

speaker: smithy
dialog: Similarly, a shorter sword is less likely to strike something unintentionally, but can block fewer hits before it shatters completely.

speaker: smithy
dialog: Now go out there and see what you can do!
<while in the air, hold the [DOWN] arrow key to perform a hammer attack>
